Articles.Content: Okay, so the thread for the creepy moments was quite old, so here I am starting a new one, but with a twist.  What is your creepiest/most lonely moment in either KSP 1 or 2, and I'm not just talking about the base games, it can be from Outer Planets, Beyond Home, wherever.  I'll start.  I had stranded Val on the Mun, so I sent a rescue craft.  As I was flying Val towards it and Jeb, I had this strange feeling that something was watching her.  I never try to do 1 man missions.
